title: Nutrition & Food Support
description: Nutrition support and community feeding programs for vulnerable households.

title: Inclusive Health Outreach
description: Disability-inclusive health outreach and medical screenings.

title: Inclusive Learning & Education
description: School materials, scholarships, and inclusive learning programs with 21st-century competency learning.

title: Skills & Economic Empowerment
description: Skills acquisition and vocational training for vulnerable groups and small-business support.

title: Climate & Environment
description: Environmental clean-up, recycling, and climate sensitization for community resilience.

title: Peace-building & Mediation
description: Peace-building and community mediation forums for inclusive development.
